protein.specific_function: Can degrade fibronectin, laminin, gelatins of type I, III, IV, and V; collagens III, IV, X, and IX, and cartilage proteoglycans. Activates procollagenase

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides
